title: 345. How to Be Happy
description: The U.N.’s World Happiness Report — created to curtail our unhealthy obsession with G.D.P. — is dominated every year by the Nordic countries. We head to Denmark to learn the secrets of this happiness epidemic (and to see if we should steal them).
author: editor@freakonomics.com (Freakonomics Radio + Stitcher)
